name: Static web server
description: Serving smaller (1-65 kb) and larger (256-512 kb) files using a static HTTP server (binserve), and benchmarking each workload (wrk) using variable number of threads and connections on the same server.

config_fields.threads: Total number of threads used by wrk.
config_fields.connections: Total number of HTTP connections kept open by wrk.
config_fields.framework_version: Version number of both binserve and wrk.
